hgeColorHSV helper class

hgeColorHSV is a HGE helper class for AHSV (alpha, hue, saturation, value) color calculations.

hgeColorHSV methods

Constructors Create and initalize hgeColorHSV object.
Operators hgeColorHSV operators.
  
Clamp Clamps the color to the allowed range after calculations.
SetHWColor Sets hgeColorHSV value to a hardware color.
GetHWColor Returns hardware color from hgeColorHSV value.
